summary: In the early 1960s, a married couple undergo hypnosis, which unlocks memories of a forgotten event on a lonely road. Soon they believe they were abducted by extraterrestrials.
cast: James Earl Jones|Estelle Parsons|Barnard Hughes|Dick O'Neill|Beeson Carroll|Terrence O'Connor|Jeanne Joe|Lou Wagner|Vic Perrin|Joey Stefano
keywords: psychotronic film|black man white woman romance|black man white woman marriage|black man white woman relationship|hypnosis
title: The UFO Incident
